name: David Ryan
body:
This is the personal page of David Ryan. I am a researcher at 
[QUT](http://www.qut.edu.au). My contact information is [d...@g...l.com](http://scr.im/davidryan) (click to view email address).

## Datasets

[SAIVT-QUT Crowd Counting Database](https://wiki.qut.edu.au/display/saivt/SAIVT-QUT+Crowd+Counting+Database)

## Demos

[Crowd counting video.](http://www.youtu.be/1FxFAeigQT4)

## Publications

### Journals

**Scene Invariant Multi Camera Crowd Counting** 
David Ryan, Simon Denman, Clinton Fookes and Sridha Sridharan 
_Pattern Recognition Letters, Elsevier, 2013_ 
[[Paper](http://davidryan.net.au/files/David-Ryan_Scene-Invariant-Multi-Camera-Crowd-Counting_PRL-SIPRCA-2013.pdf)] [[Elsevier](http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.patrec.2013.10.002)]

### Book Chapters

**Scene Invariant Crowd Counting and Crowd Occupancy Analysis** 
David Ryan, Simon Denman, Sridha Sridharan and Clinton Fookes 
_Video Analytics for Business Intelligence, Springer-Verlag, 2012_ 
[[Paper](http://davidryan.net.au/files/David-Ryan_Scene-Invariant-Crowd-Counting_VABI-2012.pdf)] [[Datasets](https://wiki.qut.edu.au/display/saivt/SAIVT-QUT+Crowd+Counting+Database)] [[Springer](http://dx.doi.org/10.1007/978-3-642-28598-1_6)]

### Conference Papers

**Scene Invariant Crowd Counting**
David Ryan, Simon Denman, Sridha Sridharan and Clinton Fookes
_Digital Image Computing: Techniques and Applications, 2011_ (DICTA 2011)
[[Paper](http://eprints.qut.edu.au/46038/)] [[Datasets](https://wiki.qut.edu.au/display/saivt/SAIVT-QUT+Crowd+Counting+Database)] [[IEEE](http://dx.doi.org/10.1109/DICTA.2011.46)]

**Textures of Optical Flow for Real-Time Anomaly Detection in Crowds**
David Ryan, Simon Denman, Clinton Fookes and Sridha Sridharan
_Advanced Video and Signal Based Surveillance_ (AVSS 2011)
[[Paper](http://eprints.qut.edu.au/41572/)] [[IEEE](http://dx.doi.org/10.1109/AVSS.2011.6027327)]

**Crowd Counting Using Group Tracking and Local Features**
David Ryan, Simon Denman, Clinton Fookes and Sridha Sridharan
_Advanced Video and Signal-Based Surveillance_ (AVSS 2010)
[[Paper](http://eprints.qut.edu.au/34498/)] [[IEEE](http://dx.doi.org/10.1109/AVSS.2010.30)]

**Crowd Counting Using Multiple Local Features**
David Ryan, Simon Denman, Clinton Fookes and Sridha Sridharan
_Digital Image Computing: Technqiues and Applications, 2009_ (DICTA 2009)
__[[Paper](http://eprints.qut.edu.au/28425/)] [[IEEE](http://dx.doi.org/10.1109/DICTA.2009.22)]

**Scene Invariant Crowd Counting for Real-Time Surveillance**
David Ryan, Simon Denman, Clinton Fookes and Sridha Sridharan
_International Conference on Signal Processing and Communication Systems 2008_ (ICSPCS 2008)
[[Paper](http://eprints.qut.edu.au/31330/)] [[IEEE](http://dx.doi.org/10.1109/ICSPCS.2008.4813759)]

**Semi-Supervised Intelligent Surveillance System for Secure Environments**
Clinton Fookes, Simon Denman, Ruan Lakemond, David Ryan, Sridha Sridharan and Massimo Piccardi
_International Symposium on Industrial Electronics_ (ISIE 2010)
[[Paper](http://eprints.qut.edu.au/40954/)] [[IEEE](http://dx.doi.org/10.1109/ISIE.2010.5636922)]
